lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho was sent off for the second time in a month on Sunday as the controversial coach watched his side draw 1-1 at home to West Ham United and lose more ground in the Premier League title race.

headline.print_headline: Mourinho Sent Off on Bad Day for United as Arsenal Win Again
headline.main: Mourinho Sent Off on Bad Day for United as Arsenal Win Again

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho was sent off for the second time in a month on Sunday as the controversial coach watched his side draw 1-1 at home to West Ham United and lose more ground in the Premier League title race....
